TopicTitle: Call for Constellation program related documents and presentations

Articles.Content:
Hi y’all,

I know there are people here who have been following space for a long time and often study the post-2000 Shuttle replacement proposals, one of which was the Constellation program.

Even though I first found out about it after it was cancelled, it’s presence in the NASA 50th anniversary online interactive website enamored me in the 2nd and 3rd grade (also, SLS at the time had no mission assigned, so it was pretty boring) and it’s one of my favorite never built projects. It also features prominently in the Japanese comic series Space Brothers, which is really good (unfortunately it hasn’t been translated into English).

Anyways, if anyone happens to have PDF files they’ve found concerning the program- whether it be stuff related to Orion, Altair, Ares I or V, or the more obscure things like the planned lunar base- if it doesn’t take too much of your time, I’d greatly appreciate it if you could share them by either posting them here or DMing me.

Thank you!

1 hour ago, SunlitZelkova said:

Anyways, if anyone happens to have PDF files they’ve found concerning the program- whether it be stuff related to Orion, Altair, Ares I or V, or the more obscure things like the planned lunar base- if it doesn’t take too much of your time, I’d greatly appreciate it if you could share them by either posting them here or DMing me.

I know I have posted some maybe in the SSTU thread, or even bluedog... not sure I bookmarked any, though. I'll look around and see if I was smart enough to bookmark some.

https://history.nasa.gov/SP-6127.pdf

https://ntrs.nasa.gov/api/citations/20090035549/downloads/20090035549.pdf

https://ntrs.nasa.gov/api/citations/20120015024/downloads/20120015024.pdf

https://ntrs.nasa.gov/api/citations/20090014053/downloads/20090014053.pdf

https://ntrs.nasa.gov/api/citations/20100022158/downloads/20100022158.pdf

I bookmarked some crap, but nothing really spectacular.

(I'm Johnny on the spot because I have nothing else to do, my wife is in London for 2 weeks, lol)
